subIssue.title: Implement API authentication and authorization
subIssue.body:
## Description
Set up authentication and authorization mechanisms for the Web API using JWT, OAuth, or Identity.

## Tasks
- [ ] Configure authentication middleware
- [ ] Implement JWT token generation and validation
- [ ] Set up authorization policies
- [ ] Add role-based access control
- [ ] Secure endpoints with appropriate attributes
- [ ] Create user authentication endpoints (login, register)

## Acceptance Criteria
- Authentication works for protected endpoints
- JWT tokens are properly generated and validated
- Role-based permissions are enforced
- User identity is accessible in controllers
- Auth configuration follows security best practices
